title: Content Writer
job_overview:
Content Writer

Job Title: Content Writer 
Role Overview:
We’re looking for a detail-oriented Content Writer to deliver 12–15 insightful articles per month (700–1,200 words each). You’ll follow briefs carefully, write clearly for our audience, and collaborate with the team to help our brands grow.
Key Responsibilities:
 • Research and write 12–15 articles per month, each 700–1,200 words.
 • Work closely with the Content Manager to follow briefs and messaging goals.
 • Incorporate SEO best practices, keywords, and user intent.
 • Ensure accuracy, clarity, and brand-aligned tone.
 • Revise drafts based on feedback promptly.
 • Deliver clean, well-edited, publishable work.
Ideal Candidate:
 • Demonstrable writing experience, especially in long-form articles.
 • Strong command of grammar, structure, and SEO writing.
 • Ability to adapt tone and style to a range of product content.
 • Deadline-driven and self-motivated.

To apply, please send:
 1. A brief cover letter outlining your experience.
 2. A writing sample (or portfolio) showcasing long?form content.
